text: Hiroyuki Abe (阿部 博幸) is a male former Japanese international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1983 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Seiji Ono. He also won two bronze medals in the men's team event. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Japanese male table tennis players Category:Asian Games medalists in table tennis Category:Table tennis players at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Table tennis players at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1978 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1982 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Japan Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Hiroyuki Abe (table tennis)
